title: Left Mouse Button Sticky In-game but fine out of game.
body: So starting the last week my left mouse button acts like it's sticky while in the game, but its fine when I'm in the regular client and everywhere else. I have no idea what the problem is, any theories? It is really annoying having to click at least 3 times to actually ping once.

replies.body:
Are you using a VOIP program such as Skype, Discord, or Curse Voice? I've heard of this type of issue being caused by either the overlays these programs create or specific hotkeys creating issues. If you are using any of these types of programs, try shutting it off and testing your mouse in-game to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this causes your mouse to act differently!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ei7AwE1n,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-25T23:42:35.162+0000)

If you are using any of these types of programs, try shutting it off and testing your mouse in-game to see if anything changes.
> 
> Let me know if this causes your mouse to act differently!

If you mean closing the window then yes, I've done it before and the issue is still happening. 
Example: I close the Curse Voice window and the overlay isn't there but my mouse still acts like it's sticky.

Actually, even if you close the window, most VOIP programs will minimize to the notification tray and still run. Try closing out the program entirely, or completing a [clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) and let me know if you notice any difference.

Ok, so i tried that and im not sure if it counts but it acts like it's less sticky but still a bit sticky.

Since you're still having issues, I suggest reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They have the tech know-how to resolve this issue for good. Be sure to link them the youtube video you posted here, as it will give them additional context on the issue.

Let me know if you have additional questions.
